articles.title: Uber aims for 50,000 Teslas on its platform by 2023
articles.description: Uber is partnering with Hertz to bring 50,000 Tesla vehicles on its platform by 2023. The company will offer drivers a weekly rate of $334 for a Tesla Model 3.

articles.title: Tesla quietly raises prices on four of its EVs
articles.description: Less than a week after Tesla reported record third-quarter profit of $1.6 billion, the automaker has increased the prices for four of its EVs.
